title: Russian banks may issue cards with China's UnionPay as Visa, Mastercard cut links - Reuters.com
content: Russian banks may issue cards with China's UnionPay as Visa, Mastercard cut links  Reuters.comView Full Coverage on Google News
description: Credit cards issued by Russian banks using the Visa and Mastercard payment systems will stop functioning overseas after March 9, Russia's central bank said on Sunday, adding that some local lenders would look to use China's UnionPay system instead.
